name: gifti-reader-js
description: A JavaScript GIFTI file format reader.

scripts.build: rm -rf build; mkdir build; esbuild src/gifti.js --bundle --outfile=build/gifti-reader.js; esbuild src/gifti.js --bundle --minify --outfile=build/gifti-reader-min.js
scripts.doc: rm -rf build; mkdir build; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md src/*.js > build/docs.md

author: Michael Martinez
